channel.title: Hello, my name is Elías

item.title: `hello world`
item.description: How could I start this blog in any different way?

item.title: `hello world`
item.description: How could I start this blog in any different way?

item.title: About
item.description: I hold a degree in Electrical Engineering from Universidad de la República, UdelaR. I like working on Computer Vision, Signal Processing and Machine Learning in general. Currently I work as a Machine Learning Engineer at Tryolabs. Apart from programming and training neural networks, I like gaming, reading, playing the guitar and tweeting. I’m also a football fan and I love supporting my team Club Nacional de Football.
